scripts.wdev: npm run watch & npm run devserver
scripts.bundle: browserify -v -r babel-polyfill -r dotty -r isomorphic-fetch -r react -r react-addons-update -r react-bootstrap -r react-dom -r react-redux -r react-router -r redux -r redux-thunk | uglifyjs -o public/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -x babel-polyfill -x dotty -x isomorphic-fetch -x react -x react-addons-update -x react-bootstrap -x react-dom -x react-redux -x react-router -x redux -x redux-thunk -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] client/index.js -o public/app.js
scripts.dev: npm run devserver & npm run bundle & npm run watch
